ai-ja452:1.2_0: that cannot be dead and deliver—
ai-ja452:1.4_0: like a little bit of dirt.”
ai-ja452:2.3_0: He is the opening of the meaning,
ai-ja452:2.4_0: I won’t strike you with food.
ai-ja452:3.4_0: such a one is seen me by the defending me.”
ai-ja452:4.3_0: My abundant wealth is full of,
ai-ja452:5.1_0: One who is astute would not speak
ai-ja452:5.2_0: you’ll do the evil deeds in life after life.
ai-ja452:5.4_0: and don’t give up desire for rebirth.”
ai-ja452:7.1_0: Whoever has cut off the tree
ai-ja452:7.2_0: would sit down or lie down on their bed,
ai-ja452:7.3_0: But you would not scare anyone:
ai-ja452:7.4_0: for it’s bad to be a bad one.
ai-ja452:8.1_0: For a man who knows the Dhamma
ai-ja452:8.2_0: and for those who wish to train,
ai-ja452:8.4_0: and don’t urge me to be reborn.”
ai-ja452:9.1_0: “One who enjoys sensual pleasures, it’s not good to misrepresent him,
ai-ja452:9.2_0: who has not gone forth is not good.
ai-ja452:9.3_0: It’s not good to do bad,
ai-ja452:9.4_0: An astute person would not be good.
ai-ja452:10.2_0: let them not fall under the sway of the body.
